item.title: US 'destroying' world order, Ukraine's ambassador to UK says
item.description: Valerii Zaluzhnyi's comments come amid an apparent cooling of tensions between Kyiv and Washington.

item.title: Jack Daniel's hits out at Canada pulling US alcohol
item.description: Some Canadian provinces have removed US-made alcohol from shelves in response to US tariffs.

item.title: Denmark postal service to stop delivering letters
item.description: The decision will end 400 years of the company's letter service, and postboxes will disappear from June.

item.title: General's arrest violates South Sudan peace deal, opposition says
item.description: Two close allies of the vice-president, a bitter rival of the president, are arrested.

item.title: What does the Department of Education do - and can Trump dismantle it?
item.description: The president has pledged to eliminate the federal agency that oversees the US education system.
